name: Naruto RPG: Uketsugareshi Hi no Ishi
overview: A Japanese-only release of this Naruto based RPG with an extremely high encounter rate. It is about Naruto's adventures from the ninja school, to battling the rival ninja forces from other countries. The battles are turn based, up to 4 characters can battle at once. You can use various ninja skills, tools and even summon spells in the battle.
